text: John William Calhoun was the 11th president of the University of Texas at Austin between 1937 and 1939. Calhoun Hall, a building constructed in 1968 and located on the University of Texas campus, is named after him. He graduated from University of Texas at Austin and Harvard University.https://tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/fca15 ==See also== * History of The University of Texas at Austin * List of University of Texas at Austin presidents ==References== Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Presidents of the University of Texas at Austin Category:University of Texas at Austin alumni
title: John William Calhoun
